entries.name: CurrentContext()
entries.desc: The current IRB::Context of the session, see ::conf

entries.name: JobManager()
entries.desc: The current JobManager in the session

entries.name: irb(file = nil, *main)
entries.desc: Creates a new IRB session, see IRB::Irb.new.

entries.name: irb_at_exit()
entries.desc: Calls each event hook of ::conf when the current session quits.

entries.name: print_usage()
entries.desc: Outputs the irb help message, see Command line options at IRB.

entries.name: start(ap_path = nil)
entries.desc: Initializes IRB and creates a new Irb.irb object at the TOPLEVEL_BINDING

entries.name: version()
entries.desc: Returns the current version of IRB, including release version and last updated date.
